接口的使用
org.springframework.web.server.WebFilterChain

  • 使用WebFilterChain的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.cors.reactive
    Reactive support for CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing), based on a common CorsProcessor strategy.
    org.springframework.web.filter.reactive
    WebFilter implementations for use in reactive web applications.
    org.springframework.web.server
    Core interfaces and classes for Spring's generic, reactive web support.
    org.springframework.web.server.handler
    Provides common WebHandler implementations and a WebHandlerDecorator.

    • org.springframework.web.cors.reactive中WebFilterChain的使用

      参数类型为WebFilterChain的org.springframework.web.cors.reactive中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<java.lang.Void> CorsWebFilter.filter(ServerWebExchange exchange, WebFilterChain chain) 

    • org.springframework.web.filter.reactive中WebFilterChain的使用

      参数类型为WebFilterChain的org.springframework.web.filter.reactive中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<java.lang.Void> ForwardedHeaderFilter.filter(ServerWebExchange exchange, WebFilterChain chain)
      已过时。 
       
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<java.lang.Void> HiddenHttpMethodFilter.filter(ServerWebExchange exchange, WebFilterChain chain)
      Transform an HTTP POST into another method based on methodParamName.

    • org.springframework.web.server中WebFilterChain的使用

      参数类型为WebFilterChain的org.springframework.web.server中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<java.lang.Void> WebFilter.filter(ServerWebExchange exchange, WebFilterChain chain)
      Process the Web request and (optionally) delegate to the next WebFilter through the given WebFilterChain.

    • org.springframework.web.server.handler中WebFilterChain的使用

      实现WebFilterChain的org.springframework.web.server.handler中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  DefaultWebFilterChain
      Default implementation of WebFilterChain.
